certifications.title: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization

projects: [{"title":"Cardiac Disease Classification Using 12-Lead ECG Signals (M.Tech Thesis)","description":"‚Ä¢ Developed various state-of-the art deep learning models to process ECG signals and classify arrhythmia. The model can help cardiologists perform assisted diagnosis of heart disease and improve the efficiency of healthcare delivery.‚Ä¢ Implemented various 2D state-of-the art models like Resnets, VGG, Transformers, Convolutional Transformers, etc. into the 1D domain for disease classification and performed data augmentation, hyper-parameter tuning, mitigated the class imbalance problem, and achieved an F1 score of 0.785 on the CPSC dataset for classification."},{"title":"Prompt Adapter (Prompt Tuning based Few-shot Learner for Vision-Language Model)","description":"‚Ä¢ Improved the performance of CLIP (Contrastive Language-Image Pretraining) for Few-Shot Classification tasks.‚Ä¢ Introduced a new method that combines pre-trained prompt tuning with a learnable filter on textual features under the guidance of few-shot image samples, which is based on the gated multi-head attention mechanism.‚Ä¢ Conducted extensive experiments to beat the state-of-the-art methods in few-shot image classification on 6 publicly available datasets, especially in settings with limited data instances such as 1, 2, 4, 8, and 16-shot images."},{"title":"Rust LLM (Fine-tuning CodeLlama-7b-Instruct for Rust Code Generation using PEFT)","description":"‚Ä¢ Improved the performance of language-specific code generation by building a lightweight LLM for Rust language.‚Ä¢ Performed Instruction based finetuning on CodeLlama-7b-Instruct using LoRA (Low Rank Adaptation of LLMs).‚Ä¢ Evaluated the performance of code generated by finetuned Rust LLM on Leetcode Top 150 Interview problems."},{"title":"Stress Detection Using EDA Signals (B.Tech Thesis)","description":"‚Ä¢ Developed ML models to categorize 3 different stress levels of a driver trained on Physionet EDA signal data.‚Ä¢ Preprocessed raw data and extracted statistical and morphological features comprising a total of 48 features.‚Ä¢ Performed data visualization using Correlation Matrix, Box Plot and selected top 10 features based on P-values.‚Ä¢ Trained various classification models like SVM, KNN, XgBoost, Naive Bayes, and MLPs with an accuracy of 85%."}]
